A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not as bad as I thought considering the ratings here. I saw the original trilogy in the theater when I was a kid\, and have been obsessed with those particular 3 movies at different points in my childhood and adulthood. I wasn't a huge fan of the prequel. Luke was always my favorite character and I waited for something like 35 years to see him again. I was okay with what was done. I kind of liked the fact that all the guilt and angst that made him my favorite was still there\, and even heavier\, with a little bit of both the Obi Wan and Yoda asthetic. That being said\, the movie does get a bit long\, and I feel like they squished all of Empire Strikes Back and part of Return of the Jedi into it\, but I am interested to see where it goes now. it's a visual masterpiece. see it in IMAX 3D if you can.
